games.title: Snake Game
games.description: Classic Snake Game - Control the snake to eat food and grow longer without hitting walls or yourself!
games.longDescription: Snake Game is one of the most popular classic arcade games of all time. Guide your snake around the screen to eat food and grow longer, but be careful not to run into walls or your own tail! The game gets progressively faster and more challenging as your snake grows. This timeless game has entertained players for decades and remains a favorite for its simple yet addictive gameplay.
controls: Arrow keys or WASD to move the snake
Space bar to pause/unpause the game
R key to restart the game
tips: Plan your moves ahead to avoid getting trapped
Use the edges of the screen strategically
Don't rush - steady movement wins the game
Create spirals to maximize space usage

games.title: Tetris
games.description: The classic falling blocks puzzle game. Arrange tetromino pieces to clear lines!
games.longDescription: Tetris is the legendary puzzle game where falling blocks called tetrominoes must be arranged to create complete horizontal lines. When a line is completed, it disappears, and you score points. The game speeds up as you progress, making it increasingly challenging.
controls: Arrow keys to move and rotate pieces
tips: Keep the stack low and even

games.title: Pac-Man
games.description: Navigate the maze, eat dots, and avoid ghosts in this arcade classic!
games.longDescription: Pac-Man is the iconic arcade game where you control a yellow character through a maze, eating dots while avoiding colorful ghosts. Eat power pellets to temporarily turn the tables and chase the ghosts for bonus points!
tips: Save power pellets for strategic moments

games.title: Frogger
games.description: Help the frog cross busy roads and rivers safely in this classic arcade game!
games.longDescription: Guide your frog across busy highways and dangerous rivers. Dodge cars, trucks, and other obstacles while timing your jumps perfectly. This classic arcade game tests your reflexes and timing skills.
controls: Arrow keys to move the frog
tips: Use lily pads and logs to rest
Don't stay in one place too long

games.title: Breakout
games.description: Break all the bricks with your paddle and ball in this classic arcade game!
games.longDescription: Control a paddle to bounce a ball and break all the colored bricks above. This classic arcade game requires precision, timing, and strategy to clear all levels without losing your ball.
controls: Left/Right arrow keys or mouse to move paddle
tips: Aim for the corners to create angles
Control ball speed with paddle movement

games.title: Space Invaders
games.description: Defend Earth from alien invasion in this classic space shooter!
games.longDescription: The legendary space shooter where you control a cannon defending Earth from waves of descending aliens. Shoot the invaders before they reach the bottom while using barriers for protection.
tips: Clear columns to reduce alien fire
